title: Night and Dawn Event Missions
body: I have finished all my milestones from the Night and Dawn Pass, however, is the weekly missions for the 200 tokens over? I have done it until week 3. Currently sitting on 1784 tokens and I'm worried I won't make it to 2200 tokens to redeem 100 prestige points.

replies.body: What will happen if i dont finish my missions on time? When the pass expires, will the rewards will not be given back? i have 10 days left to finish missions. WHAT TO DO !!?? :(
Play some games. You can farm tokens easily on ARAM and Poro King.
